|wi1_chip1_model=QT3840BC |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL2 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC2400 Dual-Band Wi-Fi VDSL/ADSL VoIP Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC87VG/}} {{see also|Pace 5268AC|Arcadyan|Foxconn}} ===Overview=== *'''Future-Proof DSL Compatibility''' :– Supports ADSL, ADSL 2/2+, VDSL2 and the latest Vplus 35b broadband connections. *'''Ultra-Fast Wi-Fi''' :– Perfect for busy home networks, with dual-band Wi-Fi delivering up to 2334Mbps ::combined bandwidth. *'''Unbeatable Wi-Fi Coverage''' :– Four antennas and AiRadar technology reduce dead zones even in the largest homes. *'''Performance to Spare''' :– Two dual-core CPUs provide the processing power for smooth and reliable operation, ::even on the busiest networks. *'''Versatile Telephony''' :– Connect analog phones, fax machines, cordless DECT phones and IP phones to create ::a complete VoIP internet telephony system ===Additional specifications=== * Per ''ASUS'''s product page: :indicates the device has two processors: :one for Wi-Fi and the other for ADSL. * Product segment: AC2400 (600+1734 Mbps) * ''Antenna'': 4x detachable antenna (2dBi) :The device has RP-SMA connectors. * ''Ports'': xDSL: 1x xDSL (RJ11) :WAN: 1x GbE (RJ45) 10/100/1000 BaseT :LAN: 4x GbE (RJ45) 10/100/1000 BaseT :USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 :FXS: 2x FON (RJ11), 2x TAE * ''Power Adapter'': :AC Input : 100~240V (50/60HZ) :DC Output : 12V / 3A *''Dimensions (W x H x D)'': [[Dimensions::317 mm x 193 mm x 87 mm]] *''Weight'': [[Weight::1050 g]] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.adslgr.com/forum/threads/956036-Asus-DSL-AC87VG ''ASUS DSL-AC87VG'' on '''ADSLgr''' forums] *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2640545 ''ASUS DSL Routers'' on '''HWupgrade''' forums] *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2783077 ''ASUS DSL-AC87VG'' on '''HWupgrade''' forums] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm63138 BCM63138] @1GHz :Dual Core ARM Cortex A9 SoC
